sentences.en: But new reports show a sharp rise in insurgent attacks -- including a 55% increase in children being injured.
sentences.cn: 但有新的报告显示，叛乱者发动的袭击数量大幅上升，儿童受伤人数也上升了55%。

sentences.en: But the general says it is not an emergency, spite of the increase of insurgent attacks.
sentences.cn: 不过施勒塞尔少将表示, 尽管暴乱袭击增加,但是现在并不是很紧急.

sentences.en: General Washington led the insurgent forces in the Revolutionary War.
sentences.cn: 华盛顿将军在独立战争中领导反叛军.

sentences.en: The attack happened yesterday in Mahmoudiya, the Sunni insurgent stronghold about 20 miles south of Baghdad.
sentences.cn: 此次袭击位于距离巴格达南部20公里远的马赫茂迪亚地区, 该地区由逊尼派武装控制.

sentences.en: The insurgent mob assembled at the gate of the city park.
sentences.cn: 叛变的暴徒聚在市立公园的门口.

sentences.en: There are also two insurgent factions in the game, to let you play as the rebels.
sentences.cn: 同时游戏中也提供了两种反叛武装的派别来供你选择.

sentences.en: There, she worked as a low-level intelligence analyst helping her unit assess insurgent activity in the area.
sentences.cn: 在那里，她是一名初级情报分析员，工作内容是帮助所在部队评估该地区的叛乱活动。

sentences.en: This is the second half of insurgent's creed.
sentences.cn: 这就是秩序颠覆者的信条的下半部分.

sentences.en: Violence has fallen sharply in the last year, despite regular insurgent attacks across Iraq.
sentences.cn: 暴力事件已大幅下降在过去的一年里, 尽管经常武装分子袭击,伊拉克全国各地.
我当时是什么人？ 一个起义者。

sentences.en: When reporting their own activities US Units are inclined to classify civilian kills as insurgent kills, downplay the number of people killed or otherwise make excuses for themselves.
sentences.cn: 当报道他们自己活动，美军倾向于将平民的伤亡推给叛乱者，对人们被杀的数目一笔带过从而来未自己制造出借口。

trans.tran_en: one of a group of people fighting against the government of their own country, or against authority
